changes.rationale: Improves above-the-fold clarity and scannability while immediately demonstrating “hand it ...

issues.description: Hero 2-column grid may push CTA below fold on mobile, breaking 8-second comprehension test
issues.rationale: 60/40 desktop split likely stacks poorly on mobile, burying primary action and value prop

issues.description: Sticky CTA only appears after 40% scroll, creating conversion gap in critical first 0-40% zone
issues.rationale: Users may bounce before reaching sticky trigger point, missing primary conversion opportunity

issues.description: Pricing moved higher but 3-column layout may compress poorly on tablets, hurting comprehension
issues.rationale: Complex pricing comparison requires adequate space; compression may force horizontal scrolling

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks clear connection to main value prop, may confuse non-technical users
issues.rationale: Table-like activity feed may appear as feature bloat rather than trust signal for general audience

issues.description: How It Works 3-step stepper may not scale effectively on mobile, breaking process clarity
issues.rationale: Horizontal steppers typically stack poorly, losing visual connection between steps

issues.description: Section reordering places proof bar too early before problem context is established
issues.rationale: Users need to understand the problem before social proof becomes meaningful or credible

issues.description: 65ch max line length may be too wide for comfortable scanning on large desktop screens
issues.rationale: Optimal reading length is 45-75ch but 65ch pushes toward upper limit, reducing scan speed

issues.description: 20px card spacing may create too much whitespace on mobile, reducing content density
issues.rationale: Mobile screens need tighter spacing to maximize above-fold content visibility

issues.description: Soft background gradients may reduce text contrast and accessibility on some devices
issues.rationale: Gradients can interfere with 4.5:1 contrast ratios, especially on low-quality displays

issues.description: Problem/Solution before/after layout may create false comparison without clear transition
issues.rationale: Two-column before/after requires strong visual cues to prevent confusion about causation

suggestedFixes.fix: Use single-column stack on mobile with CTA visible within first 568px viewport height
suggestedFixes.rationale: Ensures primary action remains above fold on all mobile devices for immediate conversion

suggestedFixes.fix: Trigger sticky CTA at 20% scroll instead of 40%, with 48px height for better thumb reach
suggestedFixes.rationale: Earlier trigger captures more users before bounce, smaller height reduces screen real estate

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 1-column stacked layout on mobile with horizontal scroll for tier comparison table
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains pricing clarity on small screens while allowing detailed comparison when needed

suggestedFixes.fix: Frame audit log as 'See exactly what happens' with 3 sample entries showing user actions
suggestedFixes.rationale: Connects technical feature to user benefit with concrete examples rather than abstract table

suggestedFixes.fix: Stack steps vertically on mobile with connecting arrows, maintain horizontal on desktop 1200px+
suggestedFixes.rationale: Preserves step relationship clarity across devices while optimizing for mobile thumb flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof bar after Problem/Solution section to establish context before credibility
suggestedFixes.rationale: Users understand what they need proof of before social validation becomes persuasive

suggestedFixes.fix: Set max line length to 55ch on desktop, 45ch on mobile for optimal scanning speed
suggestedFixes.rationale: Shorter lines improve reading comprehension and scanning velocity for conversion content

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 16px spacing on mobile, 20px on desktop with responsive breakpoint at 768px
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes content density for mobile while maintaining premium feel on larger screens

suggestedFixes.fix: Limit gradients to 5% opacity and test contrast ratios with WebAIM tool before implementation
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains visual interest while ensuring accessibility compliance across all text elements

suggestedFixes.fix: Add arrow or transition element between before/after columns with clear labels
suggestedFixes.rationale: Visual connector makes causation relationship explicit and guides user reading flow
